website_summaries.verdict: This multitasking duffle bag has a loyal and well-deserved fan base thanks to its spacious interior and handy features. It’s a versatile option that works as well for the gym as it does for travel.
pros: Features ventilated side pocket for wet shoes or clothes and water-resistant base
Available in a wide variety of colors and sizes
cons: Pockets are on the small side

customer_reviews.title: I really like this bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag, overall. It's pretty good quality. The top inside part doesn't have that terrible plastic coating on it, which is good! The straps have plastic rings.. I hope they don't ever break. It seems like a great duffel though. It doesn't have a structured bottom, so be aware of that. It looks slouchy when you're carrying it. I got the small maroon one and it's really pretty :) I do CrossFit and it'll definitely be more than enough room for all my junk. Shoes, towel, shower stuff, change of clothes, socks, wraps, water, shaker, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Top notch gym bag.
customer_reviews.text: Good size, fits my shoes in the "wet" compartment. Has an internal zip bag for keys, coins, or stuff from your pockets. End mesh bag is convenient for things you want to have quick access to. Front zip compartment is nice to separate toiletries. I don't use the shoulder strap but it has a nice one for those that want one. Zips work well, don't catch and provide good access to all compartments. Blue color is pretty nice. It's not overly big like some gym bags; this will hold your clothes, shoes, towel, some extra gear like gloves, or a workout journal, toiletries and such without being a huge bag that doesn't fit in lockers. Fits most lockers just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best gym bag I've owned
customer_reviews.text: This is just the right size (small) for my needs. The shoe slot easily fits two shoes (I'm a 10.5) and is vented so you can place your shoes in there immediately after working out and not have to worrie about moisture. The side pocket has plenty of room for all of my gym accessories including grips, knee sleeves, athletic tape, water bottle and more, then i still have the large main compartment for my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Design and material.
customer_reviews.text: The bag design is awesome. I love how it looks. The material looks great and seems durable after the few months I’ve had it. If there was anything I would improve on this bag, it would be the pocket designs. There are three pockets, two on each end and one on the front that runs the length of the bag. I wish there was a mini pocket in the main compartment of the bag and an extra mesh pocket on the outside of one of the pockets on either or both sides. That would drastically improve this bag, but for about $30 this is a great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: There's a reason this is still around
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's football gear. His helmet, equipment, and shoes all fit comfortably, along with snacks. However, he decided football isn't for him before the team was issued anything else, but his uniform would have fit comfortably in this. This will now be his wrestling and gym bag. It will fit anything he could ever need and then some more. It will last, there is a reason it has been used by athletes for most of my life. If you're on the fence about this one, buy it. I will buy the smaller one for my daughter later this year. It will be perfect for her wrestling bag.
customer_reviews.author: S.R

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and sturdy gym bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this needing a gym bag with ample room that would be durable enough to be drug and tossed around. I actually have two now and have used them for years. All said, a traditional well made gym bag that looks good. The only thing I would do to improve it in the future would be to give a bit more room on the end pocket for folks with large shoes sizes (it handles a size 12 fine, but any bigger and it would be a tough fit). I would also vent it better for wet or sweaty clothes/shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Just what we're looking for. Thanks Adidas!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a swim bag for my son that has a separate shoe bag from its main compartment. A bag that has ample room for his parka, towel, change of clothes, shoes, toiletries. I wish it was built with a secret pocket inside where you can keep your wallet and valuables. So when you leave your bag unattended on swim practices, your valuables are safe. He loves the padded shoulder strap and just the right length of handles to carry on your hand, without touching the ground.
customer_reviews.author: enamel_pearl

customer_reviews.title: Great sized gym bag
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag, it is my go-to when I'm going to the gym and need to pack my change of clothes, different shoes, and shower gear. The shoe portion is separated from the interior of the bag and accessible from the zipper on the side. Only minor issue with that is the base of that portion isn't attached to base of the bag itself, so the shoes can overlap your items in the main portion of the bag. Barely an issue but if you need to dig through it to find something, it could be hiding under the material of the shield portion.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G.

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I needed a good sized durable bag to take to the gym daily. I love the waterproof bottom and the different zipper pocket options. I also like that one of the side pockets has mesh so it is breathable, making it a good pocket to put wet items in(towels, bathing suits etc). The straps are sturdy, shoulder pad comfortable, and it’s way bigger on the inside than I anticipated! I was able to fit towels, clothes, shoes, blow dryer and toiletries with tons of room to spare 😊 awesome bag and will buy another one to use as an overnight bag or bag to travel with!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kreinbring

customer_reviews.title: Update: Downgraded to 2*
customer_reviews.text: Update: Downgraded to 2*s. The plastic shoulder sling clips make a terrible sqeeking noise after using the bag for about a month. Original: Overall I like this gym bag. It is slightly bigger than I thought it would be and the shoe side pouch easily fits my running shoes. The zippers and the bag itself feel fairly sturdy. The only downside for me is that the buckles that hold the shoulder strap to the bag are made of plastic, but they feel pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Manzano

customer_reviews.title: Big and built.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality construction, I anticipate using this for years. Quality is something I worry about with products that have so many zippers critical to their function, but these are made with durable construction. The medium size is plenty big enough for me to carry 3 pairs of gym/ lifting shoes, or two full jiu jitsu gis-- plus of course, a towel, any needed shower toiletries and a hair dryer. The larger sizes may be best suited to overnight competition trips, or sports that require helmets/padding.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Bag is awesome...and right size.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a gym bag that had the shoe compartment...and enough area to hold all of my clothes to shower at the gym without the bag being too big. This one is perfect. I can put a full days worth of clothes including shoes, and a REAL towel in this along with a huge shower bag and it all fits perfect. After buying 2 others and sending them back...Don't go cheap...get this one and live happy. LOL
customer_reviews.author: John B. Hartleb

customer_reviews.title: Best gym bag ever
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new gym bag after my last one of 5 years finally couldn't take another tear anymore. I decided on this because it was a little smaller and had a shoe compartment. I was iffy because I needed to fit mens size 11 Timberland steel toe boots in the shoe compartment but they fit! I can comfortably fit my work boots, work clothes, a towel, work out journal, watches, hair brushes, hair gel, body wash, head phones and even my shower sandals without ANY issues. I purchased the small bag because I wanted something smaller to carry around and it is perfect for all my daily needs.
customer_reviews.author: a2cool

customer_reviews.title: Solid gym bag!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I would try using this bag for travel purposes but for the daily gym use, it works. The walls are super thin so I’m afraid that a good snag will tear the bag. The zippers feel fine but definitely a little light duty. The bag holds my 10.5M shoes fine in the shoe compartment and will likely accommodate a couple sizes up.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: The straps are comfortable to wear and easy to adjust to fit your ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is extremely room. I bought it for a 4 day holiday trip to Thailand and it had more than enough space to fit everything I need including a pair of shoes and scandals. The straps are comfortable to wear and easy to adjust to fit your length. The colors are also in good quality. Overall I think this is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sloan Chua

customer_reviews.title: No more stink!
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it to transport his football equipment to and from school . It’s made of a thin but durable material making it lightweight. Also, for those of you with teenage football players, you know about the stink factor! This bag contains the funk- and that makes it worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Higginbotham

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect size for me when I'm going straight to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the medium. It's the perfect size for me when I'm going straight to the gym after work. I can pack several workout outfits, 2 pair of shoes, towel, and still have room for other clothes and items. The color is hot pink, very feminine which I love too! Overall, great bag for a great price. Wouldn't go any smaller or larger on size.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and good size.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this bag for about 3 months now. So far I like it a lot. Seems well constructed. If I had to do it over again I would buy the small instead of medium. I put gym shoes and flip flops in the shoe compartment. A bath towel, gym cloths, hand towel and small bottles of personal shower items in the main pocket. Full size headphones in the end outside pocket. Lots of room left. A small size bag would fit a gym locker better. For sports the medium bag is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Doug W.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: The Large is Huge! I store all my boxing equipment in here. Boxing Mitts, Workout clothes, cellphone in the inner bag pocket (fits my 6 inch cell phone), jump ropes, bag gloves, head gear, 2 shoes and wet clothes on the ventilated side pocket, winter gloves and ear muffs on the other side pocket. It's got way more room for more. I think this would be a great addition to anyone with lots of gear (i.e. Muay Thai fighters who carry shin guards and what not!) It feels really solid and I think it will last me a while. I think I might even go down 1 size so I don't carry this large bag everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kev'n Z

customer_reviews.title: This Bag is a BEAST!!!
customer_reviews.text: Roomy, lots of usable compartments, wet area, and shoe area. Could use a tad more ventilation however; I have a lot of stuff in my bag. It’s the most durable gym bag I’ve ever had. And it has a lifetime warranty!!! It only made sense. I upgraded from the smaller older version which my daughter has and even she hasn’t destroyed that one yet and it’s total mileage is about 4 years now.
customer_reviews.author: LiteningKid

customer_reviews.title: Size of bag
customer_reviews.text: A great bag for a frequent gym-goer. I use this bag 5 days out of the week and it works like a duffel bag should. I purchased the medium size bag hoping to have a little bit of left over space which I do. I carry my gym clothes along with lifting shoes, a lifting belt, straps, wraps and some chalk which all fits in the main pocket (shoes in shoe pocket). With the other two outside pockets I carry spare deodorant and I also put my phone and wallet in one pocket. I have nothing to complain about. This bag does what it was made for.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob_R

customer_reviews.title: Nice large bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Large size duffel bag, sturdy construction and material. Generously sized front pocket. It would be nice to have several medium/small pockets build in to store phone, headphones, wallet and keys. I am not so sure its airline friendly for carry on, perhaps need to double check with your air carrier. Otherwise its spacious, simple duffle bag, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine bag, but the strap is annoying
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it five stars just for its setup, durability, and looks, but I have to dock it one star because I wear the strap across my body and the design of the strap's hook makes it dig into my side when I'm walking with it (see pic). I swapped out the strap for one from one of my older bags and it hasn't been a bother since, but just be aware of that...hadn't seen anyone else mention it as a pain so it could just be me.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Scratches!!! Dissappointing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would never expect a company of the reputation to send out a product that is damaged. The front of the bag was covered in unmovable scratches. I was terribly disappointed for this purchase, especially because it was gift for my sister in law.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have noted, the large size is not 32.5" per se. Essentially, if you consider the handles on the sides of the bag, and you stretch it a little, it is 32.5", but, the bag itself is about 28". Nonetheless, this is a good bag. I really like that the shoulder strap attachments rotate. The bag itself seems to be of pretty good quality. Shoulder strap has comfortable padding. Has a shoe pocket. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: D.K.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, comfortable, easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: I practically lived out of this bag for nearly a year, going back and forth between school and home on the weekends. At times, I was probably carrying close to 100lbs in the bag, with no problems in any seams. It’s comfortable and easy to carry, with either/both straps. I’m planning to use it to travel the world now!
customer_reviews.author: Kyrie Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Good for gym and swim
customer_reviews.text: Always bring this bag to swim class with my son, Big enough for couple towels, some toys, floaties, swimwear ... Separate section to keep shoes away from clothes. Zippers seem to be durable. Good bag
customer_reviews.author: Stefaan VD

customer_reviews.title: 4" Smaller than Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought the (small) bag to carry my gym stuff in, including my 22" long racquetball racket. So it should fit in the 24" long small size bag, right? However, the bag's interior was about 20 inches long. Much smaller than I expected. Adidas's estimate probably included the mesh pocket on the side of the bag when it's jammed out to the fullest extent, outside of the actual bag itself. Pretty misleading, in my opinion. I returned the bag as soon as I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gym bag
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag for the price! It has lots of pockets, including a separate one for shoes. It is quite roomy and easily stores 2 pairs of boxing gloves, shoes, and a pair of clothes without any issues. Furthermore, the straps are nicely padded and quite comfortable to use. I would definitely recommend this for people that head to the gym straight from work, and carry everything with them.
customer_reviews.author: RDV

customer_reviews.title: Good Size
customer_reviews.text: Holds my basketball shoes (size 13) & shower shoes, shorts, shirts, sweat pants or jeans, first aid items, and still has room for more! The handle velcroes together, and the shoulder strap seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: free-gone

customer_reviews.title: but we assumed it would be of good quality. One month after it arrived he main ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is disappointing. It was just the size we needed for sending our son to camp. Not cheap, but we assumed it would be of good quality. One month after it arrived he main zipper broke. Adidas used a very small-toothed zipper in making this bag, something that I would think any bag maker would know would break. I wanted to return this overly expensive, faulty bag, but have passed the return date Amazon allows.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: nice bag but never received long strap to help carry bag
customer_reviews.text: Picture shows a bag with a shoulder strap that was not included in my purchase. That is the only reason for my low rating. It is extremely difficult to carry without that strap and I never would've purchased it knowing that it wasn't included. The picture should be taken down since it is misleading and makes one think the strap is included.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Small bag doesn't have the second side pocket.
customer_reviews.text: The small bag doesn't have the second standard pocket on the side ( the shoe pocket only}. The other side has net to hold a water bottle which makes it less useful for the my gym applications. I had to order the medium size even though I didn't really want the extra size. I will say in a side by side this bag looks to be made better made then the Under Armor duffle of similar size/price.
customer_reviews.author: Not my name

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bag for a week and I love it. The shoe compartment goes into the main compartment and takes up quite a bit of space but it works for me. I keep 2 pairs or shoes in the shoe compartment. A change of clothes and supplements in the main compartment. lifting accessories in the front pocket. All my other things like keys and extras in the other side pocket. I have room to spare with no problem
customer_reviews.author: albert

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love with this bag
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this bag. It's great quality, and the colors are spectacular. I ordered a small and have plenty of room for all of my gym stuff for a day (shoes, clothes, meal prep, supplements, and toiletry bag). I would absolutely recommend this bag and plan as purchasing it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Durable, great size, does not retain orders, and modern fashionable men’s look
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son uses this every time he stays at a friends house or goes to the gym. It’s perfect, and Adidas always seems to be on top of the latest boys and men’s look. Durable, and I have not noticed any strong odors as a mom!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia C

customer_reviews.title: The Daily Coach
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect bag for the daily coach. I like that its not overly large...like I imagine luggage can be. My only wish is that it came with a hard plastic removable bottom on the inside like the smaller team issue duffle I have. Easy fix, yes, but overall the bag is of good quality. I've had these Adidas bags before and they can take a beating. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Zute W.

customer_reviews.title: Would have been perfect except....
customer_reviews.text: Bag is the perfect size (we purchased a medium) and has a great side pocket for my son’s XC shoes with plenty of inside room for a change of clothes and his snack bag and drinks. Major product defect though as the handle is almost torn off after the first use. And unfortunately I’ve already embroidered the bag with his name and team!
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs Mo

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bag. I went with the medium size since ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bag. I went with the medium size since folks mentioned that the large was huge. Fits my Oly shoes, lifting belt, jump rope, water bottle, knee sleeves, etc. Quality seems much higher than my old Reebok bag and it looks much better.
customer_reviews.author: travis0260

customer_reviews.title: The bag is a lot bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a big bag, these are great...but for someone who goes to the gym before and after work, I wish they would have better ways to do compartaments within it. It's a bit too big and bulky for the average guy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: randomando

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag. Perfect for a weekend trip, or walking with some change of clothes (a bit too large for just a regular gym bag). Great quality and shipped pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: @b!

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Perfect for the gym and everyday luggage
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Perfect for the gym and everyday luggage. Plenty of compartmentalization, including shoe compartment for the stank. I use it poolside as well and the HydroShield has come in handy more times than I thought it would. All around good mid-sized duffel bag.
customer_reviews.author: BlueEyesWhiteMullet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag. Perfect size for general use. The waterproofing has proven effective. Can’t complain about anything considering Adidas also provides a lifetime warranty on the bag. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Braedione

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: I love this duffel bag for when I go to the gym there's plenty of space and room for my stinky gym shoes and it didn't cost too much
customer_reviews.author: Althea Frederick

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this bag👍👍
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use it as a gym bag.. nice sturdy bag .. bigger than expected .. I would definitely recommend this bag
customer_reviews.author: Afg818

customer_reviews.title: Solid gym bag
customer_reviews.text: Pretty spacious bag without being gigantic. Has enough compartments to store your toiletries away from your clothes so that when they eventually pop open, all of your work clothes are not covered in body wash and shampoo. I thought the blue and red would be a little "flashy" for my taste, but it is a great bag and isn't obnoxious, very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: christopher gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Good bag. No complaints
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Bought for my 12 year old boy for basketball. It’s a bit big for him, but better large than small. Lots of compartments. Great bag. Durable so far. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Yo yo jelly jello

customer_reviews.title: The Small Size is Much Smaller than Advertised
customer_reviews.text: We were super excited to have a reasonably priced, 24-inch duffel for our kids to take on trips. Unfortunately, when the Team Issue small duffel arrived, it was only 21" x 11.5" x 12" This cuts the volume of the duffel by almost 15% from the advertised volume. We double-checked the tag to be sure we didn't get the wrong bag--it said 24 inches in big white letters. We'll know better than to trust Adidas' measurements next time.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Sarah Bigwood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of Space
customer_reviews.text: Has a pocket for everything my boyfriend needs. Fits towels and size 11 shoes and clothing as well as basketball and gym accessories (ball pump, deodorant, spray, shower supplies). 100% would recommend to anyone looking for a bag that will hold everything one needs for a good workout session 💪🏻
customer_reviews.author: Shannon OKeefe

customer_reviews.title: awesome gym bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this gym bag! It's definitely on the larger size for a small. I was originally going to order the medium, but after ready reviews that it wouldn't fit in a gym locker, I ordered the small instead. The small fits perfectly in my locker, I think the medium would have been way too big. I can fit my shoes, two outfits, toiletries, and my gym towel with no problems! I also love the color! Keep in mind that this bag does not have a structured bottom. It's not a big deal, but if you want a bag with a cardboard bottom inserted, this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my grandson’s wrestling gear as well as for his snacks and drinks during tournaments. Some of his teammates have enormous bags that are heavy and hard to take on team bus. This medium sized one is sturdy and easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Stlgrm

customer_reviews.title: My trusty friend
customer_reviews.text: This trooper is used every single day and filled to the max! Still look new and is very well loved!
customer_reviews.author: Carrieadrienne

customer_reviews.title: This bag is perfect! And I ordered the small and it’s not ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect! And I ordered the small and it’s not tiny fits in the gym locker perfectly. Can hold a couple change of clothes, shoes, a hydro flask, small towel with plenty of room to spare! Perfect gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Durable and Water Proof
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter for when she stays overnight with family & friends. She loves the style, design and holds all of her things comfortably. Definately Recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Tamatha Burrus

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bag for a racquetball user like me!
customer_reviews.text: A quality bag that meets my demanding gym needs. I love the separate sealed compartment to store my racquetball shoes or dirty sweaty clothes after I shower without stinking up the rest of the bag. It's big enough to hold all my racquetball gear, towel, and others stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar H.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag: well built, many pockets, and awesome colors.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. I bought the medium. It has multiple pockets to store all my valuables. Material feels strong and has awesome colors. Only 'con' for me is that, being 5'7" the side handles are a bit loong for me, so when walking up or down the stairs, I have to lift the bag a bit higher. Other than that, I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Holds it all
customer_reviews.text: This is my new carryall bag. When I go out of town this thing def carries it all. If it cant fit in this I don't need to drag whatever it is along with me. Very sturdy construction and lots of pockets to stow things in. I highly recommend this very well made bag!
customer_reviews.author: DET

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I had a Nike bag for 10 years until it finally broke down. I looked at a lot of duffel bags to compare quality versus price. This was the best all around deal at just $30. It fits my size 14 shoes and all of my gear in there just fine. It has great depth, which is something my Nike did not. It's the same width, but that extra height makes it seem a lot bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Smith

customer_reviews.title: Larger than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Nice, great quality. It’s just larger than I thought it would be and doesn’t fit well in the gym locker. Unless you carry a lot of gym stuff (beyond clothes, shoes, water bottle and towel), it’s really wasted space.
customer_reviews.author: Rahne Connor

customer_reviews.title: I’d recommend it
customer_reviews.text: The duffel bag is really nice and I usually use it for travel. I love adidas base products and would truly recommend this duffel.
customer_reviews.author: Ryen

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality bag
customer_reviews.text: So far, this survived our sons past soccer season. I hope it continues to hold up. It seems tough, we will see
customer_reviews.author: jake geesey

customer_reviews.title: Great gym bag.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice big bag for all the equipment that I take to the gym. I wear size 14 shoes and they fit perfectly in the shoe storage end of the bag. All my other boxing gear as well as my weight lifting straps, wraps and clothes fit with room to spare. Highly recommend this bag to anyone that has a lot of gear.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Dominick

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This bag is much better than the previous version. The interior of the bag doesn't have the lining which ended up coming undone after a lot of use. It's a little bigger, however the shoulder strap is more robust.
customer_reviews.author: J. May

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag and good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for volleyball and she uses it every day. It is holding up very well especially considering the abuse that it takes from her lol. It holds all her gear and then some and she loves the style.
customer_reviews.author: phxgal

customer_reviews.title: cheap zippers didn't last 2 months
customer_reviews.text: zipper on side pocket broke within 2 months. While others had the bag replaced via amazon, the CS rep I spoke with had to transfer me to Adidas. UPDATE: Adidas referred me to agron, inc, so if you have an issue call them directly (800-966-7697, option 3). Their "lifetime warranty" only lasts 5 years, and doesn't cover a replacement bag (so odds are the life of this bag won't be one year).
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Way Nicer than you think!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12yrold boy for his basketball travel ball.Its a AWESOME BAG..I got the small an his ball ,shoes,an Uniform fits...Its way more roomy than expected...Id buy it again if I needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Legette

customer_reviews.title: The medium is a great bag for taking to the gym
customer_reviews.text: Great bag; an excellent replacement for an REI bag. Solidly built; good number of pockets. More water resistant than my last bag. I think it will last a long time as my gym bag, and I go to the gym 7 days a week. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D H

customer_reviews.title: So cute, good size, sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so cute, perfect size for my daughter to use for school sports. Looks exactly as pictured; the material is a thick, somewhat shiney material that you can wipe off with a damp cloth. It was different than what I thought it would be but it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute, great quality bag. I have used it as an overnight bag, carry-on, and gym bag. I love the shoe compartment and the size is perfect (I got the smallest size).
customer_reviews.author: ATop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This bag is being handled by a teenager when going back and forth to her fathers house, and it’s holding up, another product for the win.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Martel

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant buying this at first. Not ever knowing what your actually getting when buying online. However, this bag is very very spacious, beautiful, useful and overall I am so happy to have bought this bag! Could not have been more happier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag for the price. Has plenty of pockets, shoulder strap, and made well.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great sports bag. Holds all of her gear and it looks great. Great quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought the medium bag. It's a good size. Very durable. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: The bag was shoved into new packaging, the packing straps were hanging from it, and it smelled like perfume. I bought two other bags, one came in its original packaging and was perfect. The other bag came folded in the repack bag and I had to hunt for the top strap. At least that one didn't have a smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend. The orange is really bright and the shoulder ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it as a "basket" for my son's Easter gift. This is HUGE and has lots of pockets for keeping small items safe. Would definitely recommend. The orange is really bright and the shoulder strap has a cushion that works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Poppe

customer_reviews.title: still use it after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 years ago. Only two zippers have gone bad. It soaks like a sieve. Still use.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: The "Warranty" Is A Scam
customer_reviews.text: The "Lifetime" warranty is complete misrepresentation. It has a three year warranty and replacement is at their sole discretion. After two years the handle pulls out of the bag, too bad you are out the cost of the bag plus 15.00 shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J.

customer_reviews.title: Solid and eye catching bag
customer_reviews.text: Solid and eye catching bag with lots of space to accommodate all your stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Watch Freak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to fit a change of clothes
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Perfect size to fit a change of clothes, make up bag, toiletries, etc for the gym. The separate shoe compartment is really nice. Would also work really well for a weekend duffel bag!
customer_reviews.author: mpw

customer_reviews.title: Great trip bag
customer_reviews.text: Great size for a long weekend trip. The handle length is a bit long.
customer_reviews.author: Cali.017

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gym gear
customer_reviews.text: Not too big and not too small for my gym gear, sufficient compartments, and quickly move around with it.
customer_reviews.author: Moustafa

customer_reviews.title: It is a very good bag.
customer_reviews.text: I travel with it a lot and it is very useful. i think that people should buy this duffel bag if they travel a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kara A. Kabat

customer_reviews.title: Zipper fails from regular use
customer_reviews.text: I like the pockets, material and design - however shortly after purchasing the two main zippers (on the end of bag and the main compartment) failed. The zipper metal bent so I can only open the pockets so much. This cause my shoes to stick out and fall out when carrying. I would like my money back or a replacement with an improved zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bag is much thinner nylon versus my other Adidas bags. Very cheap feeling to it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great gym bag
customer_reviews.text: Can hold all my gym stuff. Very convenient. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: polymorphism

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great soccer bag, has held up well for over a year
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank God we didnt buy Nik e
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. He fits 2 shoes, 10 large size long sleeve jerseys, a soccer ball, keeper gloves, water bottle, shin guards, Costco size bottle of ibuprofen, cell phone, wallet, keys, etc WITH ROOM TO SPARE
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Dvorak

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I order the small bag and it is more like a large! I use mine for the gym, but I will be using it as a travel bag too. It is very roomy and a place on the side for just shoes!
customer_reviews.author: James & Maria Roberts

customer_reviews.title: The medium is really big and has a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: The medium is really big and has a lot of space. However, the vent on the side for my sweaty things could be more ventilated. I don't think there is a lot of air coming in so my workout clothes remain damp when I forget to take them out that day. The bag I had before had a wider vent opening allowing for more air to come in to prevent my things from staying damp.
customer_reviews.author: tnice242

customer_reviews.title: 90% Recomended.
customer_reviews.text: I like how it looks and feel material wise I say its good but it can be better. What I dislike is the pockets of this product. Other than that it looks durable. I will update in few months.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD

customer_reviews.title: My only disappointment was there was no hard bottom to support the ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the small bag for my 9 y/o basketball practices. Turns out it's "normal size". My only disappointment was there was no hard bottom to support the duffle bag. Otherwise with the quality, size, and price alone I would've given it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: SJack

customer_reviews.title: Great bag pefect size
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Bought the medium, which I thought would be too small, but it's perfect sized. Lots of room. Can hold more than I've been putting in it. Lots of compartments too organize and keep items in place. Hopefully it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: s_nlbauer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great for overnight or weekend packing. May be slightly large to use as a carry on for under the seat, but could be placed over head.
customer_reviews.author: Allison K. Begley

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! Good quality bag for gym equipment or traveling items. Love it! Thought it might run on the small size but the size small was great for my boxing gloves, water bottle and shoes with plenty of room to spare!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Heller

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: After six months the bag's zippers broke after regular everyday use and washing. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sabin

customer_reviews.title: Frito Bandido likes this bag
customer_reviews.text: I received my purchase today and I love it. At first I was disappointed because it was missing the shoulder strap but I found it in one of the end pockets. It is very durable for the upcoming traveling I will be doing.
customer_reviews.author: Frito Bandito

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I can't fit my shoes, foam roller, change of clothes and various other small items in this bag. Works great for me!
customer_reviews.author: JennVA

customer_reviews.title: Great gym bag
customer_reviews.text: Its a great gym bag, although it's honestly bigger that i thought i needed. Great built quality so far, comfortable on my shoulder, and i can keep my wet swimming stuff separate from the rest of my gear
customer_reviews.author: Chris Latsch

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Good look, size and design. Bought one and it was stolen so this is my second. Wish it was for another reason but I liked it so much I grabbed another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: adidas Team Issue Duffel Bag
product_meta.description: For a workout or an away game, there is no better bag with a lifetime warranty out there. if you like to keep your gear organized and separated, there are 3 zippered pockets and a huge main compartment for the big stuff. the game-changer is the hydroshield base- it's going to be able to take a beating and hold up to the elements.
feature_bullets: Gently wash by hand. Do not bleach. Line dry
4 outside zippered compartments and easy access mesh pocket to organize your gear
Performance technology: hydroshield water-resistant base to hold up to the elements, as well as freshpak ventilated side pocket for dirty shoes and gear
Comfortable shoulder strap pad and super-soft haul handle
Front zippered pocket with key fob and inside zippered valuables pocket for your small items
